text: Re classified ads on the web -- if it wasn't Craig Newmark, someone else would have made it work. I had a project myself in 1997. eBay was another instance. Amazon has a piece of the business. Yet the press blamed Newmark. They still do. It would be a welcome sign of maturity if today's journalists would stop playing dumb and just drop the idea. As Mazie Hirono said yesterday of Barr's idiocy, we understand what's going on.
